title: october 29: from ARPA to INTER (net, that is)
description:
Today on the pod, Maia charts the path of everyone’s favorite time waster: the internet. From early ARPANET to Google, she takes us through the journey of the World Wide Web. She also talks earworms and brain itches. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
